```{r}
library(readr)
volcano <- read_delim("volcano.csv",
                      delim = ";", 
                      escape_double = FALSE,
                      trim_ws = TRUE)
#names(volcano)
volcano$Year <- as.factor(volcano$Year)
volcano$Name <- as.factor(volcano$Name)
volcano$Location <- as.factor(volcano$Location)
volcano$Country <- as.factor(volcano$Country)

summary(volcano)
```


```{r}
world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
world %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf()
```



```{r}
library(rnaturalearth)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
world %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf() +
  geom_point(data = volcano,
             aes(x = Longitude,
                 y = Latitude,
                 size = TOTAL_COST,
                 color = TOTAL_COST,
                 text = Name),
             show.legend = FALSE,
             alpha = 0.8)

```
